question: Some people think that it is beneficial for children to do paid work, while others think that it can be harmful for children. What are the advantages and disadvantages of children doing paid work?

First of all, begin with, the main disadvantage of this approach is the case that job robs heir of what makes childhood unique and beautiful this is the use fact that not only offspring could not possibly juggle a job with school duties and extracurricular activities but also, they are vulnerable and can easily be taken advantage of by employers. On the other hand, having laboured for the pupil can also have its advantage. the significant one is starting to work at a young age prepares you more adequately for adult life. this can be because it teaches scion how to react and behave in situations they would not encounter at home or at school. to illustrate, a recent study on offspring that have to job in childhood shows that it makes them more appreciate the value of hard work and money.
